txt.en: Upon further investigation of the corpse of this incredibly hostile Huorn, you notice a strange piece of heartwood. This Huorn was evidently corrupted from the inside out, possibly from its long years spent in this black glade.
You have gathered evidence that the environment here makes the trees twisted and sick.\n\nTheir blackened, corrupted heartwood is likely the reason they are so aggressive in this part of the forest.
Upon fighting off a corrupted Huorn in the Black Heart, you have found something curious about his heartwood.
Corrupted heartwood can be found on Huorns throughout Fangorn's Black Heart.\n\nYou should defeat Huorns and see if they show signs of being internally corrupted.
You have gathered evidence that the environment here makes the trees twisted and sick.\n\nTheir blackened, corrupted heartwood is likely the reason they are so aggressive in this part of the forest.
